title: Pity me not - wide blossom and great tide

content.question: Taken together, the metaphors comparing love to a “wide blossom” (line 10) and a “great tide” (line 11) suggest that love is

choices.label: only sometimes able to endure hardships
common to both humanity and nature
small and insignificant in the vast universe
vulnerable and powerful at the same time

content.answer: vulnerable and powerful at the same time

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
